article_title: How The Affordable Care Act Forced Me To Become Uninsured

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: This is the story of how a professional health economist, who knows all ins and outs of health insurance, ended up becoming involuntarily uninsured as a direct result of the Affordable Care Act.
